title: Arcjolt
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| [![Arcjolt.png](/images/8/88/Arcjolt.png)](/File:Arcjolt.png) Arcjolt |                                                                                                                                 |
| :-------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Level                                                                 | 5                                                                                                                               |
| School1                                                               | [Air](/Air_Magic "Air Magic")                                                                                                   |
| School2                                                               | [Conjuration](/Conjurations "Conjurations")                                                                                     |
| Source(s)                                                             | [Book of Lightning](/Book_of_Lightning "Book of Lightning") [Maxwell's Memoranda](/Maxwell%27s_Memoranda "Maxwell's Memoranda") |
| [Casting noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                           | 5                                                                                                                               |
| [Spell noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                             | 10                                                                                                                              |
| Power Cap                                                             | 200                                                                                                                             |
| Flags                                                                 | Dir or target, Not self                                                                                                         |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | Sends a wave of electricity through everything adjacent or near-adjacent to the caster. The electricity continues to arc through everything in a connected chain, though the caster themself is unaffected. The damage dealt bypasses half of defenders' armour. |

| Spell Details                           |                |
| :-------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| Damage Formula                          | 1d(10+power/2) |
| Max Damage                              | 1d110          |
| [Max Power](/Spell_power "Spell power") | 200            |
| Range                                   | LOS            |
| Targeting                               | Special        |
| To-hit                                  | Never misses   |
| Special                                 | Ignores 1/2 AC |

**Arcjolt** is a level 5 [Air Magic](/Air_Magic "Air Magic")/[Conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations") spell which hits monsters within 2 tiles of the caster, as well as anything adjacent to a previous target.

## Useful Info

Hits all monsters within 2 tiles of the caster, or adjacent to a monster previously hurt from this spell, up to your [line of sight](/Line_of_sight "Line of sight"). This spell deals full damage regardless of how far a target is or how many targets are hit. As a spell dealing `BEAM_ELEC` damage, it also ignores half of any target's [AC](/AC "AC").

Monsters [who are immune to electricity](/Electricity_resistance "Electricity resistance") are not considered targets, and do not extend the spell's area. Allies protected from harm (such as the [Hepliaklqana](/Hepliaklqana "Hepliaklqana") ancestor or [plants](/Plant "Plant") under [Fedhas](/Fedhas "Fedhas")) are also not targets.

## Strategy

Arcjolt can hit huge packs of clumped enemies. Remember that you'll be close to said enemies; don't get too greedy with your arcs. Helpful against packs of enemies, such as [yaks](/Yak "Yak") and [spiders](/List_of_arachnids "List of arachnids").

## History

- Prior to [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"), Arcjolt only hit targets that were 1 tile away from the caster or another target. However, allies protected from harm counted as targets.
- Arcjolt was added in [0.30](/0.30 "0.30").
- During its initial implementation, Arcjolt would conduct through metal walls with infinite range. In levels with metal walls, you could use Arcjolt to hit things from the other side of the floor.
html:
Arcjolt

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
 Arcjolt
Level 5
School1 Air
School2 Conjuration
Source(s) Book of Lightning
Maxwell's Memoranda
Casting noise 5
Spell noise 10
Power Cap 200
Flags Dir or target, Not self
Sends a wave of electricity through everything adjacent or near-adjacent to the caster. The electricity continues to arc through everything in a connected chain, though the caster themself is unaffected. The damage dealt bypasses half of defenders' armour.
Spell Details
Damage Formula 1d(10+power/2)
Max Damage 1d110
Max Power 200
Range LOS
Targeting Special
To-hit Never misses
Special Ignores 1/2 AC

Arcjolt is a level 5 Air Magic/Conjurations spell which hits monsters within 2 tiles of the caster, as well as anything adjacent to a previous target.

Useful Info

Hits all monsters within 2 tiles of the caster, or adjacent to a monster previously hurt from this spell, up to your line of sight. This spell deals full damage regardless of how far a target is or how many targets are hit. As a spell dealing BEAM_ELEC damage, it also ignores half of any target's AC.

Monsters who are immune to electricity are not considered targets, and do not extend the spell's area. Allies protected from harm (such as the Hepliaklqana ancestor or plants under Fedhas) are also not targets.

Strategy

Arcjolt can hit huge packs of clumped enemies. Remember that you'll be close to said enemies; don't get too greedy with your arcs. Helpful against packs of enemies, such as yaks and spiders.

History

  • Prior to 0.31, Arcjolt only hit targets that were 1 tile away from the caster or another target. However, allies protected from harm counted as targets.
  • Arcjolt was added in 0.30.
  • During its initial implementation, Arcjolt would conduct through metal walls with infinite range. In levels with metal walls, you could use Arcjolt to hit things from the other side of the floor.
